segments.text: Just looking at that overflowing sink makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just streaming down the beautiful cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the water damage that's already occurring there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to warp the wood and ruin the finish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that puddle on the floor is just getting larger and larger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to have a massive cleanup on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really bothers me to see such a mess developing unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of squelching through that water is unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor lower cabinets are taking a direct hit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect can lead to serious structural issues over time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to reach in and turn off that faucet myself!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is quite irritating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
